contactUtilizationMethod: Grip one handle nub of the controller while letting the opposite side dangle downward. The shifted center of mass makes the device feel lopsided, approximating the off-balance character of an axe and allowing users to rehearse the deceleration tug after an imagined chop.

physicalSubstrateObject: green and white plush turtle-shell cushion
substrateUtilizationMethod: Place the cushion dome-side up on a hard floor. Swing down onto the highest point.
